CustomField.description: The individual's external ID from another database, used to match on Contact in the Lead and Contact Matching Rules.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The individual's external ID from another database. UA is using this field as an individual Type (STUD, ALUM, GSTD,FACT,STAF,FEMP,TRUE,TRUF,TRUS). As of Jan '23 no other ids are in this field.
CustomField.label: Constituent ID
